lines.text: Well, I'll leave you to it then. May you live happily and have many children, or however these stories usually end.
No no no no no, not here, not with this idiot. Come back here.
Hear me out. I saved the princess to the dungeon, bringing her all the way back to town. That means I fulfilled the quest.
Which means, I now have 600 gold pieces.
May I buy my way back into your dungeon?
